Service Details: - Offers loans to businesses for start-up or expansion- Provides an alternate source of funding to businesses for start-up, expansion or business purchase- Term financing up to 5 years to a maximum of $150,000 is available to qualified applicants is available from the General Loan Fund, Youth Loan Fund (ages 18-29), Community Business Loan Fund, and Entrepreneurs with Disabilities Fund
Eligibility: - Applicants must be residents of the Central Okanagan (Oyama to Peachland).- The business must operate and continue to operate during the term of the loan in the Central Okanagan. Applicants must not be in a position to access traditional sources of financing.- All loans are repayable in full. If your loan is approved you will meet with staff to arrange security requirements and the terms and conditions of your loan.- Community Futures is an alternative source of business capital offered at 9%. The interest rate is a set rate for the full term of the loan. Processing fees of 2% of the total amount will be applied (minimum of $350.00) upon approval and draw down of funds.- Life Insurance coverage is mandatory for loans exceeding $25,000, exclusive of fees.
How to Apply: Call for appointment or attend an Information Session
Address & Map: 1726 Dolphin Ave, #210Kelowna, BC     V1Y 9R9View MapQuest Map
